main.description: Definition of a PackableSample-compatible sample type using JSON Schema. Supports versioning via rkey format: {NSID}@{semver}

name.description: Human-readable display name for this sample type. Used for documentation and UI. The NSID in the record URI provides unique identification; name collisions across NSIDs are acceptable.

schemaType.description: Type of schema definition (currently only 'jsonschema' supported)

jsonSchema.description: JSON Schema Draft 7 definition for this sample type. Use standard JSON Schema with NDArray shim for array types.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this sample type represents

ndarrayShimUri.description: URI to the NDArray JSON Schema shim definition (optional, defaults to standard shim at https://foundation.ac/schemas/atdata-ndarray-bytes/1.0.0)

metadata.description: Optional metadata about this schema. Common fields include author, license, and tags, but any additional fields are permitted.

author.description: Creator of this schema (DID, handle, or name)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this schema version was created. Immutable once set (ATProto records are permanent).
